markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Resist Ruin](/Feats.aspx?ID=1375) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Duskwalker" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=257" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 38 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your duskwalker heritage allows you to extend protection against negative energy to yourself or an ally in need. You gain resistance 5 to negative energy, and once per day, you can cast [_death ward_](/Spells.aspx?ID=64) as a divine innate spell.
name: Resist Ruin
